column1: back of a length at middle stump, waits for it to come on and glances behind square on the leg side
back of a length outside off, reaches out for it and pushes it between point and cover point. It runs away slowly, teasing the point fielder who gives chase, and gets to the boundary
back of a length in the corridor, pushes at it away from the body expecting it to swing in. it goes straight on, past his outside edge
back of a length at middle stump, hangs back and swats across the line. Gets it a little high on the bat, but it has enough after clearing square leg
full outside off stump, squeezes it to point on the bounce, away from the body
good length at leg stump, walks at it and makes room, before flicking it to deep square leg
good length ball, swinging away from off stump. Fends nervously without feet, gets it off the outside half of the bat to third man
full and swinging away from off stump. Gets a big stride in and pushes it to mid-off's right...he tumbles to stop it
good length at off stump, gets an inside edge on the forward defence, onto boot and into the off side
goes for the slower yorker and misses. Mandeep picks it and waits patiently as it dips on him. Gets it on the full as a reward and tickles it past short fine
good length, pitches in the corridor and skids away from the outside edge as he fends outside off stump
good length at the pads, defended into the leg side with an angled bat
back of a length outside off, gets an inside into the leg side as he plays too early with the cover drive on the up
good length, angling in at leg stump, whipped on the up to deep square
back of a length at middle stump, gets the front leg out of the way and heaves this into the leg side. Doesn't connect, deep square cleans up to his left
good length offcutter outside off, he gets on one knee and slaps this on the up to mid-off. It's gone to him quickly and he can't hold on cleanly, misfields and gives away a run
good length at middle stump, goes down the track and opens the face to push this to sweeper cover
back of a length at middle stump, opens up to slog again, gets it high on the bat and it rolls to mid-on after being aerial briefly
good length ball, fired down leg side. There's space for it to spin but Kohli arches away from it and leaves it alone
tossed up at middle stump. Leans into it and flicks it wide of deep midwicket despite not getting to the pitch. There's a referral for run out as Mandeep scampers back for the second...he's well in

shot. They kept mid-on in to make Kohli go against the spin. Kohli does, and he connects this time. Once again, not to the pitch but he goes through with the lofted drive and gets it over the long-on boundary
good length ball, fired flat at middle stump. Hangs deep in the crease and pushes it into the leg side with soft hands

the ploy didn't work with Kohli, but Mandeep has fallen to it. This is tossed up at off stump. Mandeep gets low and goes for the slog sweep. His options were to hit it left or right of deep midwicket, but he wasn't to the pitch and could only pick him out
topspinner, back of a length at off stump, bunted back down the pitch after shaping to cut. Not enough room
back of a length outside off stump, transfers the weight back and cuts, straight to point
good length outside off stump, mistimed drive straight to extra cover
wow. Anticipates the slower ball and goes down the track. Meets it on the pitch at middle stump and whips it over the wide long-on boundary
full at off stump, shuffles across, to the pitch again and drives back down the pitch. Bowler gets a hand on it
back of a length outside off, gets down the track and punches on the up to sweeper cover
full outside off stump, driven straight to short extra cover...where the fielder goes down lazily and lets it through him. It was Rohit. Buttler gives chase and pulls it back
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side off the back foot

chips a slower ball straight to short midwicket. This is overpitched at leg stump, Kohli looks to flick it behind square but he's into it too early. Playing well in front of the body in the end and it's a simple catch for Rohit. Kohli looks like he's been robbed, but that was good bowling
back of a length at middle stump, solidly behind as he pushes it to mid-on
charges at this back of a length offcutter outside off, slaps it straight to cover point
shot. Mitch went back over the wicket. This was back of a length at middle and off. AB arches backward, gets on his toes to adjust for the bounce and cuts this over backward point
short ball outside off stump, steps out, makes room and slices this over sweeper cover who thought he was in for a catch briefly...it is comfortably over him in the end
back of a length at middle stump, stays put and whips this to deep square's right
tossed up at middle stump, driven to long-on
good length, fired in at middle stump, mistimed back foot punch into the off side
good length at middle stump, back away and flicks this to long-on off the back foot
good length outside off, drives to extra cover's right...and Buttler dives to stop that
back of a length at middle stump, swivels and plays a hurried pull shot to long leg
tossed up at off stump, opens his stance, makes room and pushes this to sweeper cover
good length, angled into the pads. He can't get bat on this flick, it rolls into the square leg region
good length, off stump, driven on the up to long-off
yorker at off stump, squeezed out to short midwicket
low full toss outside off, transfers the weight forward and drills this past extra cover
back of a length outside off, walks at the ball, makes room, and punches to sweeper cover
overpitched ball at off stump, Head is late on the attempted drive, jams it into the pitch with a turning bat and straight at Malinga
good length at middle stump, goes deep in the crease and just about pushes this to extra cover at the last moment
back of a length outside off stump, goes deep in the crease and slashes this past point and well to the left of sweeper
arm ball, full and angled down leg side
shot. Anticipates the drift, backs away, gets on one knee and picks it off a good length to sweep this over deep midwicket
good length at middle stump, onto the back foot quickly, punched to long-off
good length at middle stump, defended back down the pitch off the front foot
back of a length at middle stump, doesn't get enough bat on the pull, but he beats short midwicket. Deep square is quite straight, cuts it off
short and wide outside off, chops it off the back foot, straight at sweeper cover
tossed up full at off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
good length ball at off stump, steps out at it and quickly realises he's beaten for flight. Offers the pad
good length at middle stump, goes deep in the crease and punches it to long-off
wrong'un, back of a length at off stump. Punches it to long-off
back of a length at off stump, back foot punch to long-off
back of a length at off stump, waits in the crease and pushes it to long-off's left
tossed up outside off. He gets in position quickly and goes for the slog sweep. Everything right about it, except the connection. It's straight off the toe, but one bounce wide of long-on

holes out to deep midwicket. This was a short ball at middle stump, he got in position for the pull but found Hardik in the deep with a flat shot. That's the customary Pandya Bros. effort out of the way today
arm ball at off stump, hurries him on the cut, he chops it straight to extra cover
good length ball at leg stump, he tickles this with soft hands to short fine and runs casually....might have been caught short with a direct hit at the non-strikers but Bumrah missed
back of a length outside off, cuts it past a diving Rohit at extra cover, sweeper is there
good length ball at leg stump, pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket
oh beautiful. This is fired in at a good length, middle stump. Jadhav is down the track quickly to meet it on the pitch and lift it cleanly over the bowler. One bounce and four
good length at middle stump, pushed to deep midwicket off the back foot, against the turn
googly, tossed up at middle stump, pushed to long-on with a big stride and without any fuss
good length at leg stump, gets down quickly and finds deep square with the sweep
tossed up at off stump, gets to the pitch and drives to deep extra cover
incredible shot. Once more he's in anticipation of Krunal's natural drift in. Walks across the stumps, gets in positing and sweeps him over the square leg boundary

goes for it again and falls. Walks across the stump. This one is slightly shorter than the previous one. Sits in the pitch and turns as he sweeps. Gets a leading edge that goes over Parthiv and short fine jogs to his right to take it. Four out of four against AB for Krunal and he tells us with the boundary signal
good length at middle stump, pushed off the back foot, square into the leg side
drifted full at leg stump, leans into it and pushes it to long-on
nearly hits a full toss straight to deep square. This is at the leg stump and he slogs across the line, it lands in front of deep square
arm ball at leg stump, stride forward, pushed to long-on

good length ball, catches him on the pad as he goes back to it. Loud appeal is turned down, might have been going down leg. There is an for run out after a direct hit - point threw at the non-strikers. Referred and not out
back of a length at off stump, slices it to third man
good length at off stump, pushed on the up to mid-off to steal a single
poor shot and cleaned up. This is a good length ball at off stump, he swats across the line aimlessly with barely any feet and loses his stumps
yorker at middle stump, tapped into the leg side off his toes
slower ball at off stump, too full. Jadhav walks at it and shovels it over short midwicket. Long-on and deep square converge as the batsmen come back for a second
good length ball, tailing away slightly outside off stump. He opens the face to try and run it down to third man, beaten on the outside edge
back of a length outside off stump, dabbed off the back foot to point
slower ball, looped full at off stump. He's onto it early and can only push it back to the bowler
back of a length at off stump, makes room and dabs it wide of point...who dives to his right and is now wriggling in pain on the floor. It's Krunal Pandya.
slower ball, back of a length at off stump. Walks at it and drops it into the open leg side with soft hands
gives the charge again, flicks this slower ball on the pads to fine leg
slower ball, good length at off stump. Looks to open the face and push this past short third man, but he can't get it past
slower ball, short and wide outside off stump. Just about manages to place this past point and has done enough to pick up two as sweeper cover was quite straight
slower ball outside off stump, drops it into the covers with soft hands
slower ball at a length, wide outside off stump. Steps out and tries to hammer this through the covers, gets an inside edge to the keeper's left
slower ball, short and wide outside off, no pace on it. Chopped off the toe end to sweeper
slower short ball outside off stump, steps out and cuts aerially it with all the reach he can muster, only slightly to sweeper cover's right
good length ball, angled into the pads, gives him the charge and can't connect to get this past short fine
slower ball, good length outside off stump, dabbed straight to point off the front foot

gorgeous shot. This is fast and full at middle stump. Jadhav, doesn't bother going forward at this, but he's whipped it right off the middle to find the boundary to deep midwicket's left. The first one in 24 balls.
back of a length outside off, pushed to extra cover's left off the leading edge
slower ball, full at leg stump. Beats him and gets a thick inside edge, but there's no on in the infield square on leg side and so that is two
slower ball, good length at middle stump. Big stride forward before extending the forward defence into a push through the off side
slower ball, good length at off stump. He backs away and uses the room to smack this on the up over extra cover...clears the boundary too. Difficult shot, well executed
the perfect yorker at off stump, gets the leading edge as he tries to keep this out, straight to point
slower ball outside off stump, steps down the track and reaches the pitch. Hits it uppishly, inside out, on the bounce to sweeper cover
slower ball, full toss at off stump, looks to slog this but can only hit it back to the bowler on the bounce

slower ball, back of a length outside off stump. He steps out again and this time he goes wide of long-off...where Hardik gets under it and dives backwards with his right hand. Manages to reach it too but it had crossed the boundary already
full ball at off stump, slight shape away, pushed off the front foot to extra cover
yorker at middle stump, clears the front leg, drives it back at the bowler
good bowling. Negi sticks to his method and steps out at this, but he is yorked outside leg stump and beaten too
slower ball, good length at middle stump, clears the front leg and gets under this to slog this over the wide long-on boundary
overpitched at off stump, gets the front leg out of the way and drills it to long-off
full ball at off stump, shuffles across and looks to casually chip this over extra cover. Gets a leading edge that lands in front of sweeper cover
yorker at middle stump, tailing in sharply. Shows it some respect and defends into the off side
steps out at this wide length ball outside off, has to take one hand off to get bat. Once more it becomes a chip, lands in front of sweeper
bowls it full and wide. Negi is looking to make room and he's not a particularly a big man. Can't reach this, lets it go
good adjustment next ball. Gets his back leg outside off stump in anticipation, gets the length ball outside off and clubs it flat over the umpire
lifts one straight to long-on. This was a back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, back of a length. He couldn't get enough bat on the pull shot and hit it straight at Pollard

nice catch, Pollard. Mitch is over the wicket again, bowls it short and wide outside off like he does at this stage. Jadhav runs down the pitch and looks to flat-bat this over long-off but the bounce is too much. He slices it from high on the bat and Pollard maintains balance as he runs to his left and holds on to it

short slower ball outside off stump, looks to bludgeon this through the off side and is beaten...he goes for the run but Aravind is not interested at the non-strikers for some reason. Parthiv has enough time to run all the way to the stumps and whip the bails off

Chahal goes low to his right at short midwicket and holds on! Back of a length ball, climbs sharply at Parthiv who is in form and goes for the pull. But he is late on it and it lobs to the right of Chahal who is under it quickly
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side off the back foot
nice shot, but only one. Back of a length at off stump, leaps into the off side and flicks this to deep square leg off his hips
back of a length outside off, tapped to point with soft hands
good length outside off, shapes away from him and he lets it go
ruins the over with a full ball down the leg side, Rana accepts it gratefully, tickles it fine
tossed up full at off stump, leans forward and drives straight to extra cover

quicker one full at leg stump, flicked to square leg's left...Negi there, puts in a dive and recovers quickly to get the throw in. a mix-up between the batsmen but no direct hit and he seemed to have made his ground anyway
good length at middle stump, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
googly, good length at middle stump. He drags this with a sweep that lands just in front of Aravind at backward square leg who dived forward to go for the catch and deflected it to the boundary
back of a length outside off, cuts into the off side infield
good shot. This is tossed up outside off, he leans into it and places the drive nicely to mid-off's right to beat his dive
overpitched outside off, ignores his feet, trusts his hands as he drives through the line and drives well, to mid-off's left
short ball at off stump, stands tall and spanks this pull shot with all his power in front of square

short ball outside off, cuts hard at this and it flies flat at third man, where Choudhary has to make a decision. Decides to stay put and take it on the bounce. Fumbles and nearly gives away four but recovers well enough to pull it back
full ball, down the leg side

the ball just evades Choudhary who was running back from short fine leg. Rana closed the face on the leg stump length ball too early, got a leading edge that flew over Choudhary who even reached out in the end with both hands but couldn't get to it
good length at the pads, pushed to deep square off the back foot
glorious. Good length ball outside off stump, leans into it slightly and drives on the up, through the line, and past extra cover
back of a length at off stump, rides the bounce and dabs it to third man

good length ball at middle stump, he offers the full face and drives this straight back. The bowler sticks out his left boot and in the end that allows Chahal to give chase at mid-off and pull this back with a slide
good length at the pads, looks to work this past short fine, can't get bat on it. Deflected off the thigh guard to short fine

good bouncer. Phew, that launched at the batsman after pitching. Back of a length at leg stump, Buttler shapes to pull but that is too fast, he realises, and quickly sways away into the off side to let it fly over the stumps. It flicks his shoulder on the way to Jadhav, who can't catch that
back of a length at off stump, drops it into the off side with soft hands
full outside off stump, leans into it and drives to mid-off
offcutter, good length at off stump, times it beautifully on the up, AB is across to his left quickly at mid-off
shot. Full and angled into the leg stump, gets a short stride forward and punches firmly past mid-on
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length outside off stump, leans in and opens the face to get this past backward point
oh man, what a sight. Full ball at off stump, takes a few steps forward and offers the full face as he lifts this flat to long-off's right
back of a length at middle stump, misses out on the flick shot, deflection off the leg into the off side
drifted full at leg stump, flicks it behind square. Square leg dives to his right and stops it
tossed up at leg stump, driven to mid-on
tossed up at off stump, flicked off the front foot to midwicket
sweeps it into the ground from outside off, inside half of the bat, Watson dives to his left at square leg
tossed up at off stump, driven past the bowler to long-on
clean. Tossed up at leg stump, clears the front leg and lifts this over the midwicket boundary
back of a length outside off, looks good for the cut, but slides through quickly past the outside edge as he attempts it
back of a length, angled away from off stump, pushed to third man off the back foot
offcutter, good length at off stump, waits for it before tapping on the up to long-on
back of a length at off stump, looks to run it to third man again, doesn't open the face enough. It's straight to backward point
back of a length at off stump, this time he runs it to third man off the face of the bat
back of a length offcutter at off stump, defended to point off the back foot
tossed up full at middle stump from around the wicket, tapped to deep midwicket off the front foot
good length at middle stump, gets behind the line and dabs this into the leg side to pick up two
chips to extra cover. This is drifted in full at off stump, Buttler is down the pitch and looks to lift this inside-out but he was just short of reaching the pitch and skews it to the fielder
good length at middle stump, defended into the off side off the front foot
tossed up outside off, Rohit is not to the pitch. Pokes away from the body and squeezes this uppishly yo sweeper cover
good length outside off stump, defended back down the pitch
good length ball, tailing into the pads, stands tall and places it to deep square's right with soft hands
back of a length at middle stump, finds deep square with the flick this time
and he does it this time too, opens the face at this back of a length delivery outside off, beaten
good length, angled away from off stump. Goes for the expansive drive through the off side, gets a thick outside edge that is wide of point and to third man's left
good length at middle stump, pushed nervously to short midwicket with no feet
slower ball, back of a length at off stump. He picks this on the up nicely, across the line, and lifts it wide of deep square
back of a length at off stump, chops it to backward point and sends Rohit back

good length at middle stump, gets nicely under this as he smokes the slog sweep. But that has more height than distance. Head hangs under it patiently, takes it, loses balance, lobs it as he fell over backwards and recovers to take it. He says it's out...and so does the third umpire.
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to long-on off the back foot
arm ball, fired back of a length at the pads, whipped to deep midwicket's right
tossed up at middle stump. He gets inside the line, puts a big stride forward and paddles this fine. It's running away but Chahal runs to his right from long leg and keeps it in with a slide
good length at leg stump, doesn't manage to close the face on this, pushes to midwicket
back of a length at middle stump, gets the bat down late on it, but digs it powerfully enough into the pitch to get it over the bowler and take a single as mid-off runs to his right
short and wide outside off, easy cut shot for Rohit, beats point and third man comprehensively
full at off stump, wristy drive back past the bowler and to mid-off. Might have been trying to hit that into the leg side
legcutter, back of a length at off stump, driven off the back foot to sweeper cover
full and fired down the leg side, flicked to fine leg's left and his fumble allows them to breathe easy as they come back for the second
legcutter, good length at the pads, and this time he tucks it to fine leg's right and beats him
good length at off stump, forward defence

flat ball ball, full outside off. He chooses to camp on the back foot and chop away from the body. Gets an inside edge that could've been back at the stumps on another day, today it's a single behind the keeper
good length at middle stump, defended down the pitch off the back foot
good length, angled down the leg side, steps out and pushes it behind square with soft hands
drifted full at leg stump, beats his drive and raps the pads, but that struck him outside leg
another good length ball fired down the leg side, off the pad and a single through the short fine region
full at leg stump, flicked to deep square
goes for the googly, can't land it. It's a low full toss at middle stump and he taps it to long-on
the slider, good length at middle stump, pushed to extra cover off the front foot
steps down the track and gets too close to it, ends up hitting this quicker one off the inside half. It's lofted, but it is well wide of long-on
good length at leg stump, shoveled into the leg side off the pads

this time he holes out to deep midwicket. This is a similar line and length - at leg stump - to the boundary two balls ago, but is slightly slower and loopy. Once again he doesn't get to the pitch and drags it off the inside half, this time to the fielder. They check for no-ball and it looks like he has just about, by the width of a hair, managed to stay behind the line
full at middle stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot
tossed up full at leg stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot

drops it short at middle stump, he goes for the pull. It lands on the bounce to long-on...who realises Krunal is hobbling halfway down the pitch thanks to his injury earlier while fielding. Throws it in, full power and makes him sprint and leap to make his ground...which results in further pain. He is on the floor again...and he is going off again, retired hurt
full at leg stump, flicked wide of long-on
good length outside off stump, punches it to long-on off the back foot
dropped short at middle stump, back foot punch to long-on
slower ball, back of a length. Rohit walks across the stumps and looks to ramp it fine, it flies over the stump, no bat on it
back of a length at off stump, holds his shape and cuts it to sweeper's left
good bouncer. Well past Karn before he can get a hook shot away. Flies over his left shoulder and Jadhav takes it one-handed. Quite bold...
full at off stump, walks at it and drives it to long-on
full and wide outside off stump, reaches out and places this behind square on the off side to perfection. He had to place this past point and sweeper cover, did it perfectly
shooooot. Wow. Full at off stump, he stands tall and nails this cover drive to beat Chahal to his right at extra cover, and AB to his left at long-off
googly, full at middle stump. Leans into it and pushes it to deep midwicket...wanted two but Rohit didn't
good length at off stump, leans into it and pushes to deep extra cover

tossed this up outside off stump, Karn reaches the pitch of the ball and clubs this over the bowler....Kohli's sticks out his right hand after running to his right at long-on, but can only parry it over the boundary after it bounces
short ball at middle stump, pulled hard, straight to deep midwicket
full and flat, down the leg side, where Jadhav can't collect cleanly
flighted at middle stump, pushed watchfully to deep midwicket
tossed up at yorker length on middle stump, Rohit waits for it to land and pushes it through the midwicket area. That'll be the last he sees of a ball turning away from him today, unless Kohli bowls
shawwwt, folks. Back of a length outside off, slight forward press to get to this, high elbow as he punches it past extra cover
back of a length outside off stump, chopped off the under edge to short third man
bouncer at middle stump, pulls off the front foot and gets it nicely too....but it is straight at Milne at deep square leg
back of a length outside off stump, shoveled off the back foot to long-on
back of a length outside off, dabbed off the back foot to backward point
full at leg stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot
slower ball, good length at middle stump, pushed to extra cover off the front foot
slower ball, back of a length outside off stump, backs away and cuts this to sweeper cover's left
slower ball, wide outside off stump at a length, gets it off the bottom of the bat as he drives expansively, straight to the sweeper
another slower ball, back of a length outside off stump. Mistimed cut allows him to come back for two...and he cops one on the back after making his ground. He's alright though
oh good ball. This bouncer has been impressive today. Climbs in the corridor and Hardik pulls out after shaping to ramp this over short third man
slower ball, well past the wide marker at a length

yes. Gives away an extra ball after an impressive over, goes for pace after six slower balls. Drops it short at middle stump and this time there's no hesitation from Hardik. Full blooded arc as he whips this off this hips and over the square leg boundary
slower ball outside off, back of a length, cut to sweeper cover
slower ball, good length outside off, slashes hard to sweeper cover

what a shot! Oh he's back in form alright. Everyone knows this is going to be a slower ball, but not everyone can respond like this. Walks well outside off stump, gets down to this good length ball and sweeps him over the square leg boundary
back of a length slower ball outside off stump, gives him the charge and drives on the up to extra cover, where Chahal misfields...but sweeper was backing up
back of a length at off stump, cramped for room after shuffling across, pushed to long-off off the back foot
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Under edge on the cut goes straight to backward point. They take the single and that is his fifty
full and well wide, Rohit watches it go after walking at the bowler
full at off stump, driven on the up to long-off
slower short ball at off stump, can't do more than pull this to long-on

low full toss at middle stump, shuffles across the stumps and whips this between long-on and deep midwicket....but they can't come back for the second. Good fielding from Milne, running to his left at deep midwicket
close. This is a good length ball outside off. Looks to flay this through the off side on the up, gets an inside edge that misses off stump and trickles through to the keeper's left
low full toss outside off stump and he carves this off the middle of the bat, past his opposite number at mid-off to seal the win
